name: Daybreak Inn
description:
Intro

You inherited an Inn from your Uncle, but there is something sinister going on…

Tips
  • Be sure to toggle between quests and groups with the arrows.
  • You can click on the characters to seat them.
  • Hover over items on the map & UI to get info and backstory!
  • Click on the music-box to enable/disable the music.
Ludum Dare #44

Review here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/44/daybreak-inn

Attribution
  • Most of the sprites from the Fantastic CC Sprite art by Kenney!
  • CC Music and sound from Freesound
